allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
SIDEBAR-03 + INTEL-EXPAND-2 + UI-DIFFERENTIATE-1: regulatory updates page, expanded intelligence sources, null guards

- Add Regulatory Updates page with scope filter tabs \(Federal/State/Local\), agency badges, government-themed accents
- Add regulatoryUpdates nav item to sidebar for owner, exec, compliance, platform_admin roles
- Route /regulatory-updates with route guard
- Expand intelligence-collect to 37 sources across food safety, fire safety, regulatory, weather, and industry categories
- Add null/undefined guards on all .map\(\) calls in IntelligenceHub \(affected_pillars, affected_counties, action_items, full_analysis, etc.\)
- Exclude regulatory_updates category from Intelligence Hub feed \(shown on dedicated page\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
INTEL-NULLGUARD-1: fix IntelligenceHub crash — null guards on .border lookups and all .map\(\) calls

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
INTEL-PIPELINE-1: wire live intelligence pipeline to Compliance Intelligence dashboard

Hook queries only published items \(respects RLS\), live mode shows empty states instead of demo fallback, pipeline stats via edge function, dynamic source/category breakdowns derived from published insights.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
ARCH-REVIEW-1: v1.0 canonical architecture review — 12 violations identified

9-step audit covering database schema, scoring paths, risk translation,
intelligence engine, correlation engine, module governance, and derived
vs canonical enforcement. Includes 7-day migration plan.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
ARCH-IMPL-2: consolidated architecture implementation plan — 20 violations, 15-day phased execution

Extends ARCHITECTURE_REVIEW_v1.md with:
- 8 new violations \(V13-V20\) including dead compliance_score_snapshots
  table, 5th scoring engine, 5 intelligence stores, missing PDF export
- Gap analysis: reporting, jurisdiction SEO, enterprise rollup staleness
- Full schema changes \(7 phases of SQL\)
- 13 edge function modifications + 1 new \(correlation-engine\)
- 8 deterministic correlation rules
- Jurisdiction SEO architecture for 58 CA counties + 50-state expansion
- 34-step deployment order \(all additive until Day 14\)
- v1.0 Definition of Complete checklist \(28 items\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
ROLE-PERMS-1: granular role permissions management page

Two-layer permission system: role-level defaults + per-user exceptions.
Owner/Executive-only access at /settings/roles-permissions with 14 module
categories, protected permissions, confirmation modals, audit log, and
3-tier permission resolution \(user exception → org override → defaults\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
CANONICAL-SCORING-P1: activate compliance_score_snapshots + model versioning

Phase 1 of canonical scoring stabilization \(V14 fix\):
- Migration: add model_version, scoring_engine, inputs_hash to snapshots table
- Migration: create score_model_versions registry with v1.0 seed
- Migration: add snapshot_id FK on score_calculations + 5 derived tables
- Edge function: STEP 7b writes canonical snapshot after audit trail
- SHA-256 inputs_hash for reproducibility, UPSERT on \(location_id, score_date\)
- Snapshot write is try/catch isolated — never breaks scoring response

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
EDGE-FN-MONITOR-1 + COMMAND-CENTER-1 + FACILITY-SAFETY-RENAME: edge function health monitor, intelligence command center, fire→facility rename

- Edge Function Health Monitor: /admin/system/edge-functions with health summary, registry table \(18 functions\), invocation timeline, error log, cron schedule, manual invoke
- Intelligence Command Center: /admin/intelligence with 5 tabs \(signals, game plans, platform updates, notifications, crawl health\)
- Shared invocation logger utility for Deno edge functions
- System sidebar section for platform_admin \(Edge Functions + Crawl Monitor\)
- Fire Safety → Facility Safety rename across codebase
- 3 new DB migrations \(command center tables, edge function monitor tables, data wipe\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
